TB.diet: High-protein foods, green vegetables, avoid smoking
TB.precaution: Wear mask, complete medication, avoid public contact

Diabetes.cause: High blood sugar levels due to insulin resistance
Diabetes.diet: Avoid sugar, eat fiber-rich and whole grains

HIV/AIDS.diet: High-protein diet, hydration, avoid raw food
HIV/AIDS.precaution: Safe sex, no shared needles, regular checkups

Brain Tumor.diet: Fruits, fish, turmeric, avoid red meat

Diabetes.cause: Body does not produce or respond properly to insulin.
Diabetes.diet: Eat whole grains, vegetables, lean protein. Avoid sugary drinks.
Diabetes.recommendation: Regular blood sugar checks. Exercise. Take prescribed medications.

Thyroid.cause: Hormonal imbalance from thyroid gland (hypo or hyper).
Thyroid.recommendation: Regular TSH tests, medications as advised by a doctor.

Tuberculosis.cause: Infection caused by *Mycobacterium tuberculosis*, affects lungs.
Tuberculosis.diet: High-protein diet, lots of fluids, fruits, and vegetables.
Tuberculosis.recommendation: Follow full anti-TB medication course, avoid crowd exposure.

HIV.cause: Caused by human immunodeficiency virus, weakens immune system.
HIV.diet: Eat protein-rich food, fruits, vegetables; avoid raw meat and dairy.
HIV.recommendation: ART therapy, avoid infections, regular CD4 tests.

Brain Tumor.cause: Abnormal cell growth in the brain due to genetic or environmental causes.
Brain Tumor.diet: Nutrient-dense diet with antioxidants, omega-3 fats, and fiber.

Malaria.cause: Caused by *Plasmodium* parasite via mosquito bite.
Malaria.diet: Eat iron-rich and energy-rich food, stay hydrated.
Malaria.recommendation: Take antimalarial drugs, rest, prevent mosquito bites.

Dengue.cause: Caused by dengue virus spread by *Aedes* mosquitoes.
Dengue.diet: Papaya leaf juice, hydration, fruits, and light diet.
Dengue.recommendation: Bed rest, monitor platelets, avoid NSAIDs.

Chickenpox.diet: Soft foods, cold items like smoothies, avoid spicy food.

Cancer.cause: Uncontrolled growth of abnormal cells in the body.
Cancer.diet: Plant-based, anti-inflammatory foods, avoid processed meats.
Cancer.recommendation: Follow oncologist advice: chemo, radiation, surgery.

Typhoid.cause: Bacterial infection from *Salmonella typhi* in contaminated food/water.
Typhoid.diet: Liquid diet, boiled food, ORS for hydration.
Typhoid.recommendation: Take antibiotics, complete full medication course.
